course_title: Seminar in Nineteenth-Century Music - SYMPHONIC REP

001.comments: Topic:  Symphonic Repertory.  With 403H.  This course provides an introduction to the symphonic repertory of the 18th?and 19th?centuries, its history, and its performance practices. We will focus on particular formal and technical features of the most representative works, and address such issues as aesthetics, reception, and historiography. There is no textbook. Students will be assigned 2-3 advanced essays per week and/or shorter primary source readings, which they will discuss in class.2020W Format: Students attend an online seminar every Thursday from 1-3:30 pm.
